tasks.task: Attend a KANA meeting to select rice variety and create a crop calendar
subtasks: Find a KANA meeting in your area
Select the best rice variety with Extension officers
Create a crop calendar for the season

tasks.task: Use water more efficiently and prevent pests/diseases
subtasks: Use adapted rice varieties from the one-stop super
Plant at the beginning of the Maha season
Manage weeds for the first 30 days
Irrigate and drain the field at specific levels (e.g., 5 cm above surface, 15 cm below)
Apply water level management after flowering and two weeks later
If using trays, parachute plantlets in the field after 12-18 days
If using a motorized paddy transplanter, use a motorized paddy weeder
For drum-seeded rice, use a manual Kono weeder between rows
Dry paddy before storing using mobile paddy drying
